Tree.py - A derivation of the tree class from Biopython¶

Author:
Release:$Id$
Date:April 02, 2014
Tags:Python
Tree.updateNexus(nexus)¶

change trees in nexus object to trees from here.

This a quick patch until I have written a better routine to read the tree directly from a file.
